comment:
7:32 Nothing was on the offense; everything has been a defensive move because I'm being called a liar and a gold digger. I'm not after a dime of your money. I was told that was my only option [releasing video]. 
Depp: Be in your home. 
Heard: I am having to do everything, every step of the way my hand has been forced. I don't want to hurt you, I love you. 

9:25 Depp: Do you want to go to court with this, Amber? I love you more than anything in life. I do not want to go into a fucking court with you. I do not want to tarnish your name. I know you hate me. It doesn't need to happen like this. I'm trying to help you in this, I love you. Whether your love was real or not, I love you. Continuing through court is going to end up nothing but bad. It's going to be heart breaking.


12:46 Heard: It would be evidence, tons of it, and it would be through years. No one is going to believe that. 

16:06 Heard: [Quoting Lawyer] "It's the most solid evidence case of domestic violence I've ever seen" I would never want that for you. It's hard for me to accept any sort of victimdom ever.  
Depp: I'm telling you now it's a mistake to go to court. 
Depp: Amber, I didn't call you those things.
Heard: It's all coming from your side. 

18:09 Heard: "I'm not trying to jump on you. I'm sorry."
"I don't know how to get my reputation back."

"You're bigger and you're stronger."
